templeHalls.explanation: If I see a SNAKE, say 'whee' to jump over it! If I see BLOW DARTS, say 'yikes' to duck. And hey, if we spot some COINS lying around before the treasure room, say 'grab' to pick them up!
Bad news! The SWING AXE traps are working now! Say 'yikes' to not lose your hair, or worse!
There are lots of RATS here now! Shout 'whee' to jump over them!

cryptRoom.explanation: Those FLOOR SPIKES are still very pointy! Say 'whee' to hop over them!
The ground doesn't look very stable up ahead! If we get to a COLLAPSING FLOOR, shout 'whee' to jump over!
That snapping sounds like a CROCODILE! Use a tasty steak to distract it by shouting 'yum!'

templeEscape.explanation: There are ARROWS up ahead! Say 'yikes' to get down!
I think some big jungle cats got into the temple! If we find a JAGUAR, shout 'yum' to keep it busy with a juicy steak.
There are nasty POISON GAS booby traps around here! Say 'yikes' to duck under and not breath it in!

outToSea.explanation: If we see underwater COINS, say 'aha' to pull them up. If we see rocks up ahead, say WOWZER to avoid them. Remember to say a friendly 'ahoy' to to SAILORS so they don't attack us!
MERMAIDS live around here! Say 'ahoy' to be nice to them, otherwise they might think we're pirates!
I think there are some BARREL BOMBS floating in these waters. Shout 'wowzer' To avoid them!

perilousWaters.explanation: There be evil PIRATES in these waters! Shout 'whammo' to shoot the cannons at them!
I'm afraid the PIRATE QUEEN is after us! Say 'whammo' to keep her away with our cannons!
Lots of WHIRLPOOLS around here! Say 'whee' to speed through the rough waters!

shipwreckBay.explanation: BIG WAVES coming up! Say 'whee' to speed up and get over the wave!
See that? It's a giant SEA SNAKE is trying to get our ship. Shout 'kerpow' to fight it off with a harpoon.
They say the legendary KRAKEN is back! If we spot it, shout 'kerpow' to keep it away with a giant harpoon!

theVillage.explanation: Say 'aha' to grab COINS. When the the thief runs into a WALL, shout 'woo hoo'. If he falls into a MOAT, say 'splash'.
The sneaky thief thinks he can slow us down with TOMATOES. Say 'yikes' to dodge them!
The thief thinks he can outswim us across a POND! Let's stay right behind him by shouting 'splash' to swim!

castleGrounds.explanation: There are thorny ROSE BUSHES around here! Say 'whee' to jump over them and not get pricked!
Careful! I think BABY DUCKS like playing in this area! Say 'whee' to jump over them!
King Max said hungry TROLLS now roam these lands! Say 'uh oh' to find a good hiding spot when one is near!

dragonAttack.explanation: I can't believe it! A DRAGON in the sky! Shout 'uh oh' to take cover when it comes by.
Now the thief is going to throw BEEHIVES at us! Shout 'yikes' to dodge them and not get stung!
Is that a SLEEPING GIANT in the way? Shout 'woo hoo' to climb right over him!
